job_purpose: To work with the IT Team in coding, testing, and installing applications programs across multiple platforms, evaluating IT applications and equipment requirements nationwide, developing system documentation, and supporting the development of systems to achieve design and security standards.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Assist with coding, testing, and installation of applications programs in various languages and platforms
Evaluate IT applications and equipment requirements nationwide
Develop operating and system documentation in line with improvement initiatives
Support the development of systems to achieve necessary design and systems security standards
required_qualifications: Competency in programming languages: C++, .NET, Java
Experience with database packages such as MySQL, SQL Server, Postgresql, or SQLite
Ability to collaborate with users to translate core needs into software solutions
preferred_qualifications: Experience with cloud platforms like Azure or AWS
company_details: Cash Converters is Australia's largest second-hand retailer with affordable personal finance solutions. Founded in 1984, Cash Converters has grown into a leading name in retail, pawnbroking, and personal finance, operating in 15 countries. The company values responsibility, perseverance, equity, potential, and community, supporting diversity, inclusion, and equal opportunity.
